title: Goldwyn Pictures Corporation
description:
Three examples of letterhead:
Top: In black and white centered at top seal with reclining lion surrounded by banner. On banner: Arts Gratia Artis. Superimposed and centered over seal: Goldwyn Picture/ Corporation/ 16 East 42nd Street/New York. Below on left: Scenario Department. 

Center: Seal with blue globe showing the Americas. Gold rays surround the globe as well as a a belt inscribed: circulates around the world". Under the seal centered in blue text: The Northwestern Miller/ Minneapolis, U.S.A.

Bottom: Centered at top in black text: The Home Pattern Company/ Incorporated/ Sole Manufacturers of Patterns for/ The Ladies' Home Journal/ 18 East 18th Street/ New York.
name: letterhead
